website_summaries.verdict: A solid option in sun protection that's versatile enough to use for babies and older kids.
pros: Caregivers appreciate that this sunscreen is non-chemical and non-irritating
some even remarked it worked well for sensitive skin
It also gets top marks for providing good sun protection and going on smoothly
cons: A few reported it was chalky or difficult to rub in
Some felt this was on the expensive side

customer_reviews.title: Loving it...
customer_reviews.text: We've tried everything from babyganics to badger to California baby to thinkbaby to many more and either I have taken issue with or I have listened to my kids complain. This is the first one that all of us like. It goes on smooth, it doesn't smell bad (even after my kids have sweat all day), it's not overly greasy, no sunburns, and, if I take my time, my kids don't go to school looking like ghosts. I'm loving this!!
customer_reviews.author: Pondoffed

customer_reviews.title: Quick expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on reviews, EWG rating and because it is reef safe. I was feeling positive and ordered 4 tubes. The first thing I noticed is a very short shelf life. The expiration is Nov of 2019 and it is currently June of 2019. Strike 1. I've never had such a short time to use it! Second issue...I applied liberally to my children before a bit of outside play. They got more color in a short time than when I apply Blue Lizard and it lasts all day. I'm a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leah J

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is great for my toddler and baby. We use it everyday before going out to play in the yard. If they have a white film on their skin I rub it in and it is fine. I've used it on myself a couple of times too. No sunburns here!
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. i am a huge Sunology fan. I started by using the face sunscreen on myself and then recently started using the kid's sunscreen for my children. I love how it goes on thick so that you can easily see where you have applied the sunscreen but rubs in easily and doesn't leave them greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara K

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is safe and seems to do a ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is safe and seems to do a good job. What I don't like is how difficult it is to rub it in. I was rubbing it into my kids for what seemed like forever and you could still see white residue everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this "safe" (chemically speaking) sunscreen. Easy to spread, pretty non-greasy, and lasts all day on a very fair-skinned kid who is at an outside summer camp all day (in the humid mid-Atlantic environment). They only swim at the end of the day so I can't really comment on how well it holds up to swimming. Spreads much easier than the All-Terrain and Badger brands of cream sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Dearington

customer_reviews.title: Love this sunscreen!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an adult but often grab a kids sunscreen. We used this this past weekend playing beach volleyball in very intense sun. Hermosa beach california. I will say that it really is a great product. goes on nice- stays on in the water- i actually never had to reapply. yes- you will have a white face but that's the payoff for the good natural stuff !! I also bought the "face" only but haven't used it yet. Usually we buy Auwbrey Organics but I wanted to try something new. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: jack C

customer_reviews.title: Better, more reasonably priced options elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: TINY bottle. Lots of other better priced options. Good sunscreen, but not cost effective.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen moeller

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sunscreen.
customer_reviews.text: Natural sunscreen can be difficult, this goes on easy and doesn’t leave a film when we go home to wash it off and lasts a long time for us out in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Disco

customer_reviews.title: Terrific sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this sunscreen - it makes me feel better about what we are lathering all over our face - and it is the perfect weight and blends in with not much rubbing. We have used it for summer beach trips and pool trips for the past 3 months and no burning! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Tiny tube, way overpriced
customer_reviews.text: It works, it goes on nicely, not too greasy or thick, but holy moly $14 for a trial size tube? I like the all natural, low chemical formula but between my kids, husband and myself this tube lasted 1 1/2 days at the beach, in the shade. I just can't justify the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Its a little greasy, but spreads easily and rubs in well. The sun protection is great. It fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Habig

customer_reviews.title: No sunburn
customer_reviews.text: We went on a 5 day cruise and spent 2 days on the beach in Mexico. My kid was the only one without a sunburn at the end of the trip thanks to my Sunology sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Candice C.

customer_reviews.title: Goes on really easily. Will order again
customer_reviews.text: Goes on really easily. Will order again. Wish it were a little more product and weren’t so pricey. Price earned it 1 star deduction. Family of redheads living in TX, we use sunscreen by the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: This works very well. It isn't difficult to rub ...
customer_reviews.text: This works very well. It isn't difficult to rub in and seems to protect my son's sensitive skin during hours of play in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: ND Mama

customer_reviews.title: I bought this after reading the bad reviews on the bigger more well known brands
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after reading the bad reviews on the bigger more well known brands. I love it! The coverage is amazing and I felt that it did a great job of protecting my granddaughter at her out door swim lessons here in AZ! Now my daughter is a big fan of this product and will use it for her boys!
customer_reviews.author: lucee buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the "natural" sunscreens we tried this year, this one was my favorite. It was the easiest to rub in and it worked well for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: mn.nikki

customer_reviews.title: Great sunblock, a little pricey
customer_reviews.text: Sunology is a pretty great sunblock. It goes on easily and is the right consistency for easy spreading. It does not feel caked on when applied and blends in well. The coverage is fantastic and keeps you safe from the harmful effects of the sun without all of the added chemicals. It scores a 1 on the EWG list of recommended sunblocks (one being the best score). My only issue is the price is more than I would want to pay on a regular basis. If it weren't for that it would have been ranked 5 stars. For now I prefer using thinksport for kids sunblock which also scored rank 1 on the EWG list.
customer_reviews.author: Gwyndolyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for baby with eczema
customer_reviews.text: My son suffers from mild eczema. I noticed that as he was going in the sun more and wearing California Baby Sunblock his eczema was flaring up pretty badly. I decided to switch to this sunblock instead and haven’t looked back ever since!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use as a face sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I really like sunology face 50 SPF...but it has been out of stock for a long time. I really need to have good zinc coverage and this sinology (baby) provides it. Sometimes I'm a little to white from the zinc, but nothing that can't be blended in.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Eco-friendly and skin-friendly. I use the kids version on the kids and the adult version on the adults. Awesome stuff, no irritation.
customer_reviews.author: PCA34

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Mineral Sunblock
customer_reviews.text: Love this mineral sunblock. I have found out of the many I have tried it goes on the smoothest. It does rub on car seats, etc. as I haven't found a mineral sunblock that doesn't... but it's worth that one annoyance to know I'm not putting horrible chemicals into my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H.

customer_reviews.title: There is wonderful sunblock. No scary chemicals like in most sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: There is wonderful sunblock. No scary chemicals like in most sunscreen. Plus this is very creamy so easier to apply than other natural sunblocks.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Be

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I'm a redhead and this works really well without turning my skin orange.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product does go on nicely, but both my daughter and I ended up ...
customer_reviews.text: The product does go on nicely, but both my daughter and I ended up burning despite following the directions and reapplying the product.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda McGovern-Gray

customer_reviews.title: but like the product
customer_reviews.text: smaller tube than i was expecting. but like the product.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my pale grandson
customer_reviews.text: Product that does what it says. Works great for my pale grandson. He can play outstide with no worries about sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like that the product is safe but it smells awful
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Pricey and small
customer_reviews.text: I like the sunscreen, however, it's a little pricey for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really like this sunblock.
customer_reviews.text: I like this sunblock, it is easy to spread on the face, nice for children.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great product! It works well and is easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It works well and is easy to apply, which is not true with all of the more natural sunscreens.
customer_reviews.author: SoCo

customer_reviews.title: Gritty
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin feel gritty. Can't wait to wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: LRussell

customer_reviews.title: Love that is save and free of all the fake ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that is save and free of all the fake stuff, I even used it on my dad and he loved it :) Im buying this again
customer_reviews.author: CESARINA

customer_reviews.title: Sunology is doing it right
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is pretty darn good if you want a less toxic option. It goes on pretty easy and if rubbed in will pretty much disappear. I was previously using Think Sport and I like this better. The Think Sport seemed to dry out my skin and didn't blend in all that well. This has a moisturizer in it that really seems to work. When applying remember, a little goes a long way. You don't need a mound of this on your palm. You'll just never rub it in.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Yonke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only sunscreen that my son has not had a reaction to.
customer_reviews.author: Gib

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works well for our son who has dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it is safe and easier to apply than most zinc based sunscreens but still stings eyes.
customer_reviews.author: NF-New Jersey

customer_reviews.title: The best chemical free sunscreen on the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic sunscreen! I tried it on my two young children during our spring break trip. I'm always opposed to using chemical sunscreens on their delicate skin but I find that zinc sunscreens often don't absorb well. This was quite the opposite! It was silky smooth and extremely easy to apply. I could see where it was applied (a bonus on children) but it quickly absorbed and did not leave behind a white residue. More importantly, it protected my kids for hours while in and out of the pool. I will only use Sunology products on my family and for personal use going forward!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Wolf

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love the feel of it and it works better than NON natural brands full of chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Cvh

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT, THE NATURAL WAY!
customer_reviews.text: Works well in serving its purpose, the natural, healthy way! If you don't like the trouble of rubbing it on and having a bit of white left when you're done rubbing, this isn't for you. But the "white" stands reason they call natural sun blockers "physical sun-blockers", which is definitely the best way to keep our skin protected from all the "UV's" listed in there! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LGFitness

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, goes on smoothly, doesn't leave you in a white film.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: A must for the beach or pool!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this product! It works better than anything else I have used and living in Florida near the beach, we use A LOT of sunscreen. I have two boys and they are constantly in the water both the pool and the ocean. This product stays on for hours and nothing gets through. Also, a little goes a long way! I am just now finishing my 1st bottle after 8 weeks of summer! Thank you for making such a great product that I feel safe putting on my boys.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product now for 3 years and it is a great sunblock. My dermatologist recommended it because it is safe and free of chemicals. It is thicker so it doesn't absorb into the pores like other products, so use sparingly. A little goes a long way. It doesn't feel tacky like other sunblocks and provides hours of protection while in water. I tried many other products and this one wins out for me and my entire family. Give it a try--you will feel confident in the protection that it provides. Fabulous sunblock for adults and kids!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: If you don't mind the grease...
customer_reviews.text: My kids haven't burned with this sunscreen, but I am not sure I am totally sold on it. It is super greasy - so greasy, in fact, that even after washing my hands twice, I still felt a residue. Definitely a little disappointed since it is a pricey sunscreen. My search continues...
customer_reviews.author: fashionista15

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Never once did anyone get burned, goes on smooth. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Donna S

customer_reviews.title: This did not prevent me from getting too much sun ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not prevent me from getting too much sun. I tried to be careful in the application but still did not adequate provide protection.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!  Works great! Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This new formula is smooth as silk and such a pleasure to use on my sensitive skin! I have several spots of skin cancer, so it's beyond important that I keep covered up and use sunblock, especially while undergoing treatment, and this stuff is just terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Schuler

customer_reviews.title: but leaves a pretty distinct chalky look
customer_reviews.text: I am a gardener for a living, so I am in the sun a lot. This product does the job, but leaves a pretty distinct chalky look. I guess if you were a baby, you wouldn't care. I am probably going to try the non-baby version next time. It does what is says, it is a good sunscreen and gets high marks for being low on toxic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome safe product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this sunscreen! It’s my go-to! Apparently it’s others go-to as well. I set mine down at a zoo on a bench and while still sitting on the bench sunscreen-into my kids someone walked by and picked it up and stole it. 😳 Wish I had “product insurance” on it.😜
customer_reviews.author: Dana- Dog Owner

customer_reviews.title: Free of Oxybenzone, my choice for my Infant Son.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sunscreen without Oxybenzone... found it! The tube is smaller than I expected, and smaller than most sunscreens you could buy at a drugstore for this price, but I feel better knowing I'm putting something "safe" on my infant son. This did take a while to soak in, so rubbed off a bit on his stroller and our floor... but it was easy enough to clean off with some soapy water.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients and great protection from the sun
customer_reviews.text: This sunblock is incredible! Well worth the money!! I have been using this on my son (17 months old now) all summer and he has not been burnt once. A little definitely goes a long way! I have plenty left for the rest of the summer and will be repurchasing for next year when i run out. I have 4 stars because i do wish there was more product for the price, but it met and exceeded my expectations. Great ingredients and great protection from the sun.
customer_reviews.author: michela

customer_reviews.title: Did t rub in welll
customer_reviews.text: My Beautycounter is way better for smell and quality. Protection of this is good
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Muchow

customer_reviews.title: Used for our preemie on our trip to Sanibel Island ...
customer_reviews.text: Used for our preemie on our trip to Sanibel Island. Worked well, no sunburn for her! She did not complain about her eyes stinging, which was a big concern for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Is a good sunscreen, but does leave a "white" sheen on skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I used this sunscreen on 2 diffeent children, neither has really sensitive skin and they BOTH ended up with a slight rash. I applied it liberally and reapplied every hour even tho it said it would last for 80 minutes....both kids ended up with minor sunburns. Won't be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: TParker77

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful natural product for sensitive skin & eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this months ago. My skin and eyes are super sensitive to most normal Sunscreens. I was looking for a more natural clean sunscreen that I could use on myself and my 5 year old son (who has super sensitive skin too). We loved it! No burning eyes or irritated skin and I will definitely be ordering this again! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Bridemore2001

customer_reviews.title: It protects you
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen works well. It rubs on smoothly. The only challenge is it is zinc so white marks will get in the car if you don’t rub it in well
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Trinca-Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: We used this sunscreen while at the pool for one hour and all got sun burnt.
customer_reviews.author: thatgirl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. A little pricey but it has protected my little ones very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fare skinned kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this sun screen! It doesn't have a smell and isn't too greasy once it is worked into the skin. My extremely fare skinned kids played outside for about 1.5 hours with no sun burn!
customer_reviews.author: Katee

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: TINY tube....and while I have no doubt it blocks the sun, it is thick and doesn't apply well. Will not purchase again, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally - a great zinc based sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Finally a zinc based sunscreen that doesn't make me look like a ghost, or dry out my skin, or that I sweat out as white paste. I am really happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Chwalisz

customer_reviews.title: After applying the product both my kids face was horrible, I didn't want to link the bad skin ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to try this product, however it's not what I expected! After applying the product both my kids face was horrible, I didn't want to link the bad skin with the product but as soon as I stop using it and tried another brand their skin went back to normal! Too expensive and not really worth the price 😞
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I feel good about putting this on my kids. Its hard to get it rubbed in completely but it does work really well. Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: According to EWG.org, this is one of the healthiest products for your kids and that's why I like it. It is also very smooth and easy to apply. I will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid coverage is easy to get with this very creamy sunscreen. Stays on reliably even through a long hot outdoor run.
customer_reviews.author: J. Snider

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative for those seeking a sunblock without toxins
customer_reviews.text: Has worked well at high elevations. It leaves a barely noticeable white layer of cream. I recommend this as an alternative to sunblocks containing toxic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: This sunscreen is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sunscreen. I used it on my own face and I am a middle aged adult. It wasn't like most zinc sunscreen. It was easy to blend in and didn't leave my face white. Will definitely use it again!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Great for darker skin
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a mineral sunscreen and you have darker skin, this works great.
customer_reviews.author: Boston Mama

customer_reviews.title: works great - no toxic stuff
customer_reviews.text: Was on a list of safe and chemical free sunscreen so we bought it. Its terrific. It works.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job and is super healthy
customer_reviews.text: Most of the sunscreens that are made without tons of chemicals don't work on my kids. This one is the exception. It does a great job!!
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Steinberg

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one rubs in better than the yellow and green ones, but still leaves a white hue!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: with proper application it protected my poor pale ginger kids
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, with proper application it protected my poor pale ginger kids.
customer_reviews.author: chillin

customer_reviews.title: This is our new-go to sunscreen for the kids
customer_reviews.text: We are always on the look out for a safe sunscreen that is effective and doesn't cause a huge struggle with our children during application. Sunology rubs in easily, you don't need a ton of product, and it doesn't leave a lot of white residue which our children push back against.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit too thick - hard to apply compared to other brands we tried.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Henry

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work that well and dried my kids skin out a little.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Marin

customer_reviews.title: It works and doesn't have an obnoxious odor like other sunscreens
customer_reviews.text: It works and doesn't have an obnoxious odor like other sunscreens, so my sons to hate putting it on.
customer_reviews.author: Trying Annie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Would purchase again. Goes on a bit thicker than typical sunscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Experienced Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Spreads on pretty nicely, Just wish it was a little more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Animatrine

customer_reviews.title: Finally a safe sunscreen that isn't paste!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this sunscreen based on EWG ratings. Been loyal users of badger sunscreen but it'S so hard and time consuming to put on. I've had challenges with safe sunscreen in them being too pasty and hard to put on. This is so much better and throughout the entire time of using our first bottle she has never gotten a sunburn. She barely even has tan lines! It's still a bit white but maybe I'm putting to much on... Regardless it is definitely way smoother and much easier to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: The best so far, works fine for adults
customer_reviews.text: Better than the 3 or 4 other biodegradable sunscreens I've tried so far. Went on white (as they all do), but after rubbing in for a few minutes, whiteness went away. Consistency is great. So far, not greasy or clumpy. Will stick with this one from now on. Oh, by the way, I'm an adult using the kids version of the sunscreen. It seemed to get better reviews than the adult version. I don't understand anyway why there's ever a distinction.
customer_reviews.author: fitzsimmons084

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth
customer_reviews.text: Spreads on smooth leaving no white on skin. Haven't gotten burned using it, so I can only assume it is working. Livestrong recommended this brand (and others) because of its safe ingredients and effectiveness. It is a lot of money for sunscreen. A little bit does go a long way though. Maybe that's why other reviewers had trouble rubbing it in, they may have used too much. Does not have an unpleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: tizzie44

customer_reviews.title: Burned Badly!
customer_reviews.text: I would give it zero stars if I could. It goes on thick and leaves a fair skinned person looking like a ghost. And to make things worse, my son got burned so badly that we had to end our vacation early. He's the only one who used this brand.
customer_reviews.author: mom2rbk

customer_reviews.title: A New Favorite
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sunscreen for use on vacation in extreme sun and hear in mid July. It worked excellently...even with swimming for more than 80 minutes in the middle of the day. No one got burned and even after vacation, this is my new favorite! It does have a slight white tint, but it is easily rubbed away to a clear sheen when rubbed into hands prior to applying. A little goes a long way, and is a real skin-saver on vacation or even at home. You will be happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: I didn't look close at the ingredients so I don't know there is zinc oxide in this product but it felt/looked like that is what
customer_reviews.text: As sun protection it works, I think. It was so sticky and left a bizarre bluish white layer on my skin I didn't leave it on long. I didn't look close at the ingredients so I don't know there is zinc oxide in this product but it felt/looked like that is what I was smearing on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sunology Kid's & Baby Safe Mineral Sunscreen SPF 50 Broad Spectrum Lotion, 2 Ounce Tube
feature_bullets: Gentle fragrance-free sunscreen lotion for kids and babies (6 months and up). Infused with natural moringa oil; good for sensitive skin
Top rated by EWG with a ''1" and Leaping Bunny certified cruelty-free
Highest SPF 50 broad spectrum UVA/UVB sunscreen (per FDA compliance); Highest level of water resistance (80 minutes)
Free of the harmful chemicals oxybenzone and avobenzone; paraben free, PABA free
Does not burn or sting the skin or eyes; made in the USA
